```{=html}
<style>
.film-strip-container {
  position: relative;
  width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  background: #000;
  padding: 40px 0;
  margin: 40px 0;
}

.film-strip {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 20px;
  animation: scroll 30s linear infinite;
  width: fit-content;
}

.film-strip:hover {
  animation-play-state: paused;
}

.film-frame {
  position: relative;
  flex-shrink: 0;
  width: 400px;
  background: #1a1a1a;
  padding: 20px 10px;
  border-radius: 4px;
}

.film-holes-top,
.film-holes-bottom {
  position: absolute;
  width: 100%;
  height: 15px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 0 5px;
  left: 0;
}

.film-holes-top { top: 5px; }
.film-holes-bottom { bottom: 5px; }

.film-hole {
  width: 8px;
  height: 8px;
  background: #000;
  border-radius: 2px;
}

.film-image {
  width: 100%;
  height: 250px;
  object-fit: cover;
  border: 2px solid #333;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.film-image:hover {
  transform: scale(1.05);
}

.film-label {
  text-align: center;
  color: #fff;
  font-family: 'Courier New', monospace;
  font-size: 14px;
  margin-top: 10px;
  letter-spacing: 2px;
}

@keyframes scroll {
  0% { transform: translateX(0); }
  100% { transform: translateX(-50%); }
}

@keyframes scrollReverse {
  0% { transform: translateX(-50%); }
  100% { transform: translateX(0); }
}

.film-strip-reverse {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 20px;
  animation: scrollReverse 35s linear infinite;
  width: fit-content;
}

.film-strip-reverse:hover {
  animation-play-state: paused;
}

.section-title {
  font-family: 'Courier New', monospace;
  font-size: 2rem;
  font-weight: bold;
  letter-spacing: 4px;
  text-align: center;
  margin: 40px 0 20px 0;
  color: #EBD5B2;
}

.arrow {
  background: rgba(235, 213, 178, 0.8);
  border: none;
  font-size: 3rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  color: #433B36;
  font-weight: bold;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  transform: translateY(-50%);
  z-index: 10;
}

.arrow:hover {
  background: rgba(235, 213, 178, 1);
  transform: translateY(-50%) scale(1.1);
}

.arrow-left { left: 20px; }
.arrow-right { right: 20px; }
</style>
```
